Resources

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.6″]

Resources

The purpose of this website is to assist you in the employment process. H.I.M. Recruiters provides these resources to you to enhance your success.

  • Career planning
  • Why use a recruiter?
  • Our approach
  • Resume tips
  • References
  • Telephone interview tips
  • Personal interview tips
  • Letters of offer
  • Letters of resignation
  • Counteroffers
  • Pre-employment physical exams

These tools in conjunction with our years of experience will provide you the path to a successful career transition.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_color=”#82be5a” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_module=”572″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_cta title=”Start Your Job Search” button_url=”https://www.himjobs.com/search-jobs/” button_text=”Search Jobs” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_enable_color=”off”]

View all of the HIM job opportunities available now.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
